meta.title: Contract #015: The Asset
meta.description: EXTRACTION: Conflicting narratives. Use Simultaneity to corroborate the true path.
meta.journal: The 'Eastside' sighting was a plant. The target was moving West. The Tracker, the Toll Booth, and the Cell Tower all confirm the westward trajectory simultaneously. The witness was paid off.

nodes.text: --:-- - Cell Tower: Handshake with Target Device (West).
--:-- - Air Traffic: Unidentified Helicopter entering airspace.
--:-- - Witness: 'I saw him walking near the East Docks.'
